name: Xmas in Bad Santa Arena
description:
Load your guns and fire up this Christmas with the absolute Xmas in the Bad Santa Arena game! Try your skills in this online multiplayer deathmatch!

Believe it or not these holidays you are not going to get bored thanks to this thrilling first-person shooter game! Fire shots to your enemies, defend yourself and claim the victory. If you also like playing minecraft you will find it extremely fun since everything in this game is block-like.

You can either play on multiplayer or single-player mode. Choose from a variety of different characters like Santa Claus, Elf, Reindeer, Snowman, Christmas Tree and many more and let the bombard begin. Open fire to other players and avoid their hits, so that you don't get killed and manage to be the last man standing. Try every map, discover their secrets and good spots for better view and attacks, and become the winner.

*** Single Player Features ***
In this single player mode you will face countless players and shots from all sides! Where are they coming from? You will need a lot of power to defend yourself! The more shots and minutes you survive in survival mode, the higher ranking you’ll get on the score table! Prove your skills to your friends and be the best on the scoreboard!

*** Multiplayer Features ***
- Worldwide and local
- Unique amazing maps that you will fall in love at first sight. And new apps are already in the making, so we are sure you won't be disappointed!
- Chat mode is available so you can chat with your friends and colleagues during the game
- Team match and death match mode!
- Exciting experience that can really get you hooked!
- Amazing background music and sound effects
